english.segment1: The love of the Father. The passion of the Son. The miracle oflife that You gave
english.segment2: The grace of forgiveness. The wonder of heaven. The beauty of closeness to You
english.segment3: You gave Your life so that I might livew. And You called to me with open arms. Let me know You more. Let me know YOur heart
english.segment4: You are the air that I'm breathing in. I can't live without you. Life-giving water to my soul, I thirst for You
english.segment5: The gift of salvation. The promise of heaven. Living forever with you
